DOC.brief_title: Improving Outcomes Underserved Women With GDM
DOC.detailed_description: Using step care design , woman randomize standard care Telemonitoring . In standard care group , woman monitor blood glucose level four time day , perform fetal movement counting three time day also record insulin dos . The woman record information logbook , review medical team prenatal visit . In Telemonitoring group , woman receive standard care anmd also transmit blood glucose fetal movement information health care provider .
